posts.postText: I regularly play on NNJG and I was wondering why I was banned. I don't know if I was perma banned or temporarily banned, nor was I made aware of why I was banned. I think it may be a mix up as a player with a similar name as me was rdming and griefing in the server, his name was Valkrey:Trapped in the moon, my ingame name is Val''Kyre.

1st: here's the website for banning
http://nnjg.site.nfoservers.com/sb/
2nd: Follow the template,
Your In-Game name:
Your Steam ID:
Reason:
Length of Ban/Date and Time of Unban:
What server were you playing?:
Who banned you?:
Why should we unban you?:

I don't even need to know your id or anything, I banned you and you directly with your steam id. You rdmed a day ago, and rdmed during rtv round just a couple of rounds ago from when I post this.
Sides, its only a day ban.
You can't make unban requests for bans a day or less (i think a day still isnt allowed).
